participant_1.background:
I remember listening to Yo Gotti with my brothers in the car on our way to the beach.
I play the guitar because it is a good way to express myself and I enjoy the challenge of learning new songs.
I am a writer that is also sensitive to people's reactions to my work.
I love the outdoors and finding new ways to express myself.
i love to go to the beach.

participant_2.background:
I need a home with a large music room for my guitars and a space to display my pointe shoes.
I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time.
I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet.
i watch youtube videos.
I'm a homebody but I'm excited to move to a new city to start my culinary career.

content.text: Not much, just thinking about my upcoming move to a new city to start my culinary career.
Oh wow! That's exciting. I've never lived in a new city before.
It's definitely a little scary, but also exciting. I'm looking forward to meeting new people and exploring a new place.
I bet you're going to do great. You seem like a really hard worker.
Thanks! I'm trying to be. I'm just really excited to start this new chapter in my life.
I'm sure you'll be successful. What kind of food do you like to cook?
I love to cook all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably Italian food.
Oh, that's my favorite too! I love pasta and pizza.
Me too! I could eat pasta every day.
Me too! I'm kind of a pasta addict.
Well, we'll have to have a pasta party when I get settled in.
Sounds like a plan! I'm sure it'll be a lot of fun.
Me too! I'm so glad I met you.
Me too! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
